name: Soco: The Martian Snail
description:
HOW TO PLAY

You ONLY need your MOUSE to play this game.

Soco, can NOT walk, the only way he can move is using his GRAPPLING HOOK CHAIN CANNON

Move the CURSOR to Aim at the PLATFORMS or SIDEWALLS and press LEFT CLICK to shoot the Grappling Hook and rise up.

We recommend to use a MOUSEPAD

GAME DESCRIPTION

Soco, My Martian Friend,

The Veruc-Ark volcano has erupted.

The lava is consuming Monrk-Raghan: the Martian Research Tower

The Floor is too hot! You cannot walk over it.

You NEED to ESCAPE from Monrk-Raghan!

There is ONLY ONE way out: UP

You have ONLY ONE tool: YOUR GRAPPLING HOOK CHAIN

There is ONLY ONE way to move: AIM AND CLICK

There is ONLY ONE button to push: LEFT CLICK

Good Luck…
